com.box.boxjavalibv2.exceptions

Class BoxServerException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.box.restclientv2.exceptions.BoxSDKException
          • com.box.boxjavalibv2.exceptions.BoxServerException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxMalformedResponseException, BoxUnexpectedHttpStatusException

    public class BoxServerException
extends BoxSDKException
    Exception wrapping error responses received from api calls. This indicates api response is received so network level is good, however server returns error information.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
